summary: Removes the extra sound effect played when unsheathing enchanted weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Quiet unsheathing of enchanted weapons
=======================================

I became irritated by hearing that sizzling sound every time I unsheathed my fire enchanted bow, 
so I replaced every sound file for such unsheathing effects with silent versions. Now, weapons 
only have the regular sound effects played when being unsheathed.

To install, unzip in your \"Data\" folder. 
To uninstall, delete the directory \"Data\\sound\\fx\\mag\\enchantedunsheathe\\\".
author: greentea101
